name: Cardboard Survival
description:
Why haven't you played the Warehouse Life Simulator yet?*

*aka "Cardboard Survival"

We Have:

      

But "seriously" now:  Cardboard Survival is a survival game set in a warehouse with lots of cardboard (there will also be ikea mode) and no living being ... but only for a time. ❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏ The game is mainly based on the construction of cardboard boxes. That will allow you to survive the nights. ❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏ The game also has atmospheric graphics (at least I think so). ❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏❏ Obviously the game is Alpha / Prototype capable so a lot of things may change in the future.
